mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_UID ,A.BOARD_TITLE ,A.BOARD_CONTENTS ,( SELECT ID FROM USER WHERE UID = A.USER_UID ) AS BOARD_AUTHOR ,A.BOARD_HIT ,A.BOARD_TIME FROM BOARD A WHERE TYPE_UID = #{boardType} ORDER BY BOARD_UID DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{lastPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( TYPE_UID ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENTS ,USER_UID ,BOARD_HIT ,BOARD_TIME ) VALUES ( #{boardType} ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardContents} ,( SELECT UID FROM USER WHERE ID = 'admin1' ) ,0 ,SYSDATE() )
